abstract: Earnings per share were $1.59, above analysts’ prediction of $1.49, as industrial demand in the United States helped offset slowing foreign markets.
snippet: Earnings per share were $1.59, above analysts’ prediction of $1.49, as industrial demand in the United States helped offset slowing foreign markets.
lead_paragraph: The 3M Company, maker of Post-it notes and fuel system tuneup kits, reported a 4.6 percent increase in its first-quarter profit on Tuesday, beating analysts’ forecasts, as industrial demand in the United States helped offset slowing markets abroad.

headline.main: Rising Demand in U.S. Helps 3M Beat Earnings Estimates
headline.print_headline: Rising Demand in U.S. Helps 3M Beat Earnings Estimates
